issues.title: Allow repository maintainers to override tags for issues
issues.body: Issues do not always come with appropriate and meaningful tags. They can end up being noise if maintainers are not able to rectify them. It is also nice to be able to track the progress of issues with tags.

issues.title: Issue not showing up in list.
issues.body: Namely this one: [/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/issues/view/?15Z4H5K8YxjqGWpPxMLHWwr6Ve2nR7dz8d/0@1CbKntVWfLEZ25KGQiedSYhZMdAiuKQF3u](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/issues/view/?15Z4H5K8YxjqGWpPxMLHWwr6Ve2nR7dz8d/0@1CbKntVWfLEZ25KGQiedSYhZMdAiuKQF3u). I can't find it in the list on multiple ZeroNet clients after posting a new issue.

issue_comments.body: Persists after updating Git Center and rebuilding database.
